posts.text: LeetCode-101 对称二叉树 ![题目](/image/2019-12-09 122513.png) 迭代法：层次遍历的每一层的节点，每层存入一个数组中，若二叉树对称，每层都是一个回文数 1# Definition for a binary tree node.2# class TreeNode:3# def __init__(self, x):4# self.val = x5# self.left = None6# self.right = None78class Solution:9 def isSymmetric(self, root: TreeNode) -> bool:10 if not root:11 return True12 queue=[root]13 while(queue):14 next_queue=list() #存储下一层的节点（从左至右）15 layer=list() #存储当前层的节点值16 for node in queue:17 if not node:18 layer.append(None)19 continue20 next_queue.append(node.left)21 next_queue.append(node.right)2223 layer.append(node.val)2425 if layer != layer[::-1]: #回文数判定26 return False27 queue = next_queue28 return True
